skills.title: HTML
skills.description: I have solid skills in HTML, allowing me to create semantic and accessible web structures. I use tags and HTML elements to give form and content to web pages.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: My experience in CSS allows me to bring web pages to life. I can apply attractive styles and layouts, controlling colors, typography, box design, and the overall appearance of elements.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: I have knowledge of JavaScript and can create dynamic interactions on websites. I can program scripts to improve the usability and functionality of web applications.

skills.title: REACT.js
skills.description: I am proficient in developing with React, a popular JavaScript framework. I can build reusable components and create high-performance, interactive web applications.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.description: I am familiar with Bootstrap and can take advantage of its set of predefined components and styles to speed up web development. This allows me to create responsive and attractive websites efficiently

skills.title: Git & GitHub
skills.description: I have skills in Git and version control, which allows me to collaborate effectively on software development projects. I can manage branches, merges and monitor change history.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: My background in UI and UX design allows me to create intuitive and engaging user interfaces. I consider usability and user experience at every stage of design.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I have development skills using Webflow, allowing me to create visually appealing and fully functional websites without extensive coding. I can translate designs into high-quality web experiences.
